books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by J.R. Ward
books.description: The 17th book in the Black Dagger Brotherhood series. Secrets about inhumane experiments surface at a biomedical firm.
books.name: THE SAVIOR

books.author: by Amor Towles
books.description: A Russian count undergoes 30 years of house arrest in the Metropol hotel, across from the Kremlin.
books.name: A GENTLEMAN IN MOSCOW

books.author: by Bobby Hall
books.description: A depressed young man’s secrets are exposed when the grocery store where he works becomes a crime scene.
books.name: SUPERMARKET

books.author: by James Patterson and Brendan DuBois
books.description: An Army intelligence officer must commit a crime or lose her kidnapped husband and daughter.
books.name: THE CORNWALLS ARE GONE

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by A.J. Finn
books.description: A recluse who drinks heavily and takes prescription drugs may have witnessed a crime across from her Harlem townhouse.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN THE WINDOW

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: A family is torn apart when the daughter becomes addicted to drugs and goes missing.
books.name: RUN AWAY

books.author: by James Patterson and Brendan DuBois
books.description: Sally Grissom investigates the disappearance of President Harrison Tucker’s wife.
books.name: THE FIRST LADY

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Dirk Cussler
books.description: The 25th book in the Dirk Pitt series.
books.name: CELTIC EMPIRE

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Pam Jenoff
books.description: Grace Healey investigates the fates of 12 women who were sent to occupied Europe to help the resistance during World War II.
books.name: THE LOST GIRLS OF PARIS

books.author: by J.A. Jance
books.description: The 14th book in the Ali Reynolds Series. An imprisoned fertility doctor seeks revenge.
books.name: THE A LIST

books.author: by Gail Honeyman
books.description: A young woman’s well-ordered life is disrupted by the I.T. guy from her office.
books.name: ELEANOR OLIPHANT IS COMPLETELY FINE

books.author: by Greg Iles
books.description: The journalist Marshall McEwan returns to his hometown, which is shaken by two deaths and an economy on the brink.
books.name: CEMETERY ROAD
